entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • deps.json missing local project reference #45686
  • OutputPath (`-o`) option should ensure trialing slash #45682

Closed

  • dotnet build and dotnet publish commands don't act on project build dependencies #45687

PullRequests

Created

  • Nit Compatiblity tools improvements #45685
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Don't require there to be a supported runtime pack runtime identifier for crossgen2 #45487
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
